name: Old Harbor Quarter
role_in_state: Historic core port and transshipment quarter
economy_niches: Salt storage, grading and export packing
culture_adjustments: Denser Coastal Tongues port-dialect with many trader loanwords
Stronger guild arbitration and civic privileges than hinterlands
Maritime ritual practices concentrated in public quays
More cosmopolitan contact rituals due to transshipment traffic
Practical skepticism toward inland ascetic orders
risks: smuggling and graft at customs points
constraints: Limited buildable space; vertical densification only
Dependence on imported reagents for ritual-linked trades
notes: Navigation-augury booths concentrated near main piers
Guild courts handle most commercial disputes locally
Older quays are uneven and require frequent maintenance
